name: marionette-player
description: A audio player built with Marionette.js
author: Henrique Silverio

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] -t hbsfy -t uglifyify src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.copy: cp -a src/player/fonts dist/fonts && cp -a src/player/images dist/images && cp -a src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build: rm -R dist && npm run build-css && npm run build-js && npm run copy
